label: KActions
description: This extension for Karoo devices allows to send automated whatsapp, sms or mail messages when you start, stop your activity. You can send alse custom webhooks.
releaseNotes: Added custom messages. Fix when karoo < 1.5481.548. Fix reboot allows new notifications. Added events selection. Added only for outdoor activities (only available karoo end march version). Fix time between actions. Minor fixes.
